name: Slide To Six! Swipe Number
description:
HOW TO PLAY:
- Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move all tiles on board
- When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one.
- When merge two tiles of six, they will explode and you will get 1 coins
- Get as high score as possible.
- Good luck!

Features :
- High score
- Leaderboard
- Undo support
- Delete a block support
- Share with friends
- Clear and simple UI

Have fun!
